description.narrative: Attero Recycling Private Limited (Attero or the Company) is a company based in India that recycles electronic waste (e-waste). A pioneer in the nascent domestic e-waste recycling market, the Company is unique in India for operating across the full spectrum of the e-waste recycling activities, from sourcing to recovery of component materials. Attero is currently the first and only such end-to-end e-waste recycler officially recognized by the Government of India as having environmentally sound management facilities. Attero seeks to become the leader in the rapidly emerging e-waste recycling sector in India, and is committed to grow in an environmentally friendly and socially responsible way. To do so, Attero is engaging in this project, the focus of which include: expanding its recycling capacity; growing its sales and marketing activities to, among other things, raise awareness of the importance of safe disposal of e-waste; developing further the logistics of sourcing e-waste across the country effectively and in a socially inclusive manner; and continuing its research and development initiatives to improve the efficiency of its recycling operations.

This project has the potential to generate a powerful demonstration effect that could result in additional capital flowing into the domestic formal e-waste sector. This will support growth of a small and evolving, but critical market. The community at large will also benefit as the growth of Attero will result in a greater portion of e-waste being recycled in an environmentally sound manner, avoiding the dumping of hazardous substances that have negative health impacts. The project also supports climate change because re-cycling metals from state-of-the-art e-waste technology consumes less energy and generates less hazardous emissions than mining them. The project will allow the Company to grow, generating employment in an environmentally and socially conscious sector that would not have otherwise been created.
